column5: Hi, I read on another board that Daryll had two heart attacks. Does anyone know if this is true?  And hey, even if it is or isn't, let's be nice here!
If it's true I hope he will be okay
Hope he gets well soon. Nobody deserves to go through that.  Rob C
Old News! He's back home from what I heard. The big D is OK!! God bless him!!!
Yeah thats definitly scary...hope he pulls through all right!
Daryl's son is a member...hopefully he has good news for us.
Wishing him well and   to a speedy recovery.
Released from hospital on Wed and doing okay from what I heard.

That's too bad, I know a lot of guys on here carve on Chronzy but you know what, he opens peoples eyes to how simple fishing can be, he goes up North, and catches a ton of fish using a jig and a plastic minnow, no fancy baits, 30 rods/reels, etc... And he has a shore lunch, one of the most fun and enjoyable aspects of fishing in the boonies. I hope the big guy gets well soon.
Josh, how's he doing?  I'm going to guess your not reading posts right now but let us know when you can, cheers. Get better Darryl.
Hope all is well with the big D, I enjoy his show and his point of view.  Get well!
Best of luck and a speedy recovery.
Chronz is the man, cause he keeps' it real. Mad respect.  Get well soon.
he better get well..... there is a serious lack of guys like him on TV these days.  God bless
